title: Ranked down past usual time?
body:
How come ranked is down? Usually its up by 10/10:30am NZ time, but now its 12:30pm. Could it have anything to do with the instant recall bugs?
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3dfzfv/instant_recall_bugs_megathread/

replies.body:
Hey

Thanks for posting about this.  It is related to the recall issue that you mentioned.

We've got an [announcement post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/7eKz7fzV-ranked-queue-disabled-160715) here that we are going to keep up to date.


Cheers
Mindstar
